title: 命令错误

txt_content:
全都砸出来了



Unexpected token 'm' at: minecraft:snow",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{first:1b,display:{Name:"snow_Block"}}}}\",auto:1b}"


/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ 
{Time:1,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Passengers:[{id:"FallingSand",Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Passengers:[{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~161 ~ minecraft:chain_command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Item] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:crafting_table 0 /kill @e[type=Item]\",auto:1b}
"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~162 ~ minecraft:chain_command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/execute @e[type=Item] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:crafting_table 0 /summon Item ~ ~ ~  {Item:{id:"minecraft:snow",Count:1b,Damage:0s,tag:{first:1b,display:{Name:"snow_Block"}}}}\",auto:1b}
"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~163 ~ minecraft:repeating_command_block 0 replace {Command:\"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] 155 1 {Item:{id:"minecraft:sugar",Count:9b,Damage:0s}}\",auto:1b}
"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:lava 15 replace"}]}]}
